io.micronaut.web.router

Interface UriRoute

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<UriRoute>, Route, UriMatcher

    public interface UriRoute
extends Route, UriMatcher, java.lang.Comparable<UriRoute>
    Represents a Route that matches a URI.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher
